title: piNi tIra
sahitya:
piNi tIra undanadu tuNai kOri vandEnayyA taNikai tigazh shiva subrahmaNyA enadu


anupallavi

  iNai vErillAdu anaivarkkum tannaruLai illai enriDAdu aLLittarum ayyE


caraNam    matiyin kuraivAlum mamataiyin niraivAlum vidhiyin satiyAlum vimOcanamurAdu nAn
gati pera karuNAnidhiyAgum undan padam tudi sheyya munainda en matiyInamAna perum
